slots.title: Nashville Software School Kickoff Party
slots.summary:
Come celebrate the start of Nodevember 2017! Join us for snacks, drinks, and shenanigans as we prepare for 2 days of Javascript fun.

Meeple Mountain, host of Nashville's Board Game Meet-up, will host our evening of board games, antics and prizes at Nashville Software School (NSS).

Also plenty of time to catch up with familiar faces and mingle with new friends over craft beer, wine, and heavy hors d'oeuvres.

Your Nodevember conference ticket is required for admission to the Kickoff.

Come join us!

slots.title: After Party
slots.summary:
Nodevember 2017 will wrap up at the beautiful Ruby Nashville, walking distance from the conference. [Heroku](https://www.heroku.com) helps us get our party on and send out the conference with a bang. Join us for drinks, music, and discussions on our favorite Nodevember moments - and maybe even a little origami.

Your Nodevember 2017 conference ticket is required for admission to the Nodevember After Party at Ruby.
